MedicalTreatment.Name: Regular Doctor Visit
MedicalTreatment.Description: One of our less qualified doctors will surely be able to help you out.

MedicalTreatment.Name: Decent Doctor Visit
MedicalTreatment.Description: Look at Mr. Rockefeller, shelling out for a ~r~real~s~ doctor.

MedicalTreatment.Name: Full Body Treatment
MedicalTreatment.Description: Our crack team will scan, poke, and prod you until you are like new!
